Our admission counselors are available to guide you through the process and answer any questions you may have about our programs and facilities.

Campus Facilities

Sri Ramachandra Engineering College boasts state-of-the-art facilities, including modern classrooms, well-equipped laboratories, a comprehensive library, and high-speed internet access.

The campus also features an auditorium for events and guest lectures, multiple cafeterias offering diverse cuisines, and a sports complex with facilities for indoor and outdoor sports.

Academic Programs

Our college offers a wide range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs in engineering and technology. Students can choose from various specializations, including Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Cyber Security, and Internet of Things.

Requirement Details
Academic Qualification Minimum 60% aggregate in 12th standard (PCM)
Entrance Exam Scores Valid entrance examination scores (JEE/TNEA)
Application Process Completion of online application form

We also provide opportunities for students to participate in research projects, internships, and industry collaborations, ensuring they gain practical experience and skills relevant to their fields.

Student Life

At Sri Ramachandra Engineering College, student life is vibrant and diverse. We encourage students to participate in extracurricular activities, clubs, and organizations. From sports and cultural events to technical fests and hackathons, there is always something exciting happening on campus.

The college also has student-run clubs for various interests such as robotics, coding, music, and drama, offering ample opportunities for personal growth and networking.

About Sri Ramachandra Engineering College

Sri Ramachandra Engineering College is renowned for its cutting-edge curriculum and state-of-the-art facilities. The college offers a range of programs in emerging technologies such as Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Cyber Security, and Internet of Things.

With a strong focus on practical learning and industry collaboration, students are well-prepared for successful careers in the tech industry. The college also boasts an excellent placement record and provides numerous opportunities for research and innovation.
